screenshots.caption: Extracting with colored output and a progress bar

name: innoextract
short_description: Inno Setup is a tool to create installers for Microsoft Windows applications. innoextract allows to extract such installers under non-Windows systems without running the actual installer using Wine.
summary: Tool to unpack installers created by Inno Setup
